messages.message: Last one from me today - Anyway we can include a fuzzy matching package in AIHub? Currently there is no way to do fuzzy validations of things like ‘ABC Inc’ and A.B.C. Inc’ (AFAIK?)
do you have an example where you’d need this, would be good to work out if a prompt would work here
yeah seems like a good use case for clean?

Cleaning only works when you know exactly how and when to clean; not all rules apply all the time, whereas the likelihood of things such as an OCR getting a character in a name wrong or customers having listed their name as ABC on one doc and ABC INC on another is high from my experience
